originalText.text:
I recently made an appointment with Andrea  for a cut, highlights and blowout after my trusted hairstylist moved out of state. The result had my boyfriend saying WOW ðŸ¤© (and of course me too) Literally when I walked in the door he didnâ€™t have any words besides a big smile and WOW! That says it all!

To start, Andrea took the the time to listen to my desires- I wanted my hair looking fresh, sun kissed, dimensional and not overdone. After a brief consult we agreed and Andrea started to work her magic. Then after about 2.5-3hrs, I was out the door with freshly highlighted hair and a gorgeous voluminous blow out! Her experience definitely shows in the result. I would definitely recommend Andrea to anyone!

originalText.text: Andrea is the only person I trust with my hair color. Not only is she a super talented hair stylist and colorist, but she is also one of the kindest people to be around. I consistently receive numerous compliments on my hair color, and the highlights always look very natural. Andrea doesn't rush through the process; instead, she ensures that everything is exactly as you want it to be. Her extensive experience and passion for her work result in top-quality service. I can't recommend her enough.
